modName: Khajit Den And Tavern - The Scratching Post
summary: A hidden tavern on the outskirts of Riften. With the minority of Khajit in Skyrim and racial abuse of elven and animal like races, the Khajit set up a safe haven for their kind. But in the back of the tavern a scheme is afoot.
descriptionHtml:
A hidden tavern on the outskirts of Riften. With the minority of Khajit in Skyrim and racial abuse of elven and animal like races, the Khajit set up a safe haven for their kind. But in the back of the tavern a scheme is afoot.

In the back of the tavern you will find a den of high ranking Khajit warriors and a suspicious chest guarded by them.

This is only the building for the clan and questline | am preparing which will involve the Khajit drug smuggling operation in Skyrim.
author: Ethan OBrien
